p: Fig. 4 shows the results of the overall assessment by the patients and investigators to evaluate the efficacy of treatment. According to the dynamics domain of the ACSS, at visits 2, 3, and 4, the percentages of patients who rated the change in their condition as only a little better, no change, or worse were 58.0%, 21.6%, and 12.3%, respectively. According to the overall assessment by the investigator at visits 3 and 4, the percentages rating the changes as only moderate, poor, or very poor were 14.7% and 8.5%, respectively, and the corresponding percentages for the patients were 16.7% and 9.1% ( Supplementary Table 2).
